Package main

Class UIManager

java.lang.Object
main.UIManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class UIManager extends Object implements Manager
The manager for the UI of the application.

Is instantiated inside of LearningManagementSystem and should not be instantiated anywhere else.

Initializes all the Menus that are used in the UI, and opens the Start Menu (#MENU_START) whenever run() is called.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Isaac Fleetwood, Aryan Jain
See Also:
LearningManagementSystem, Manager

  • Constructor Details

    • UIManager

      public UIManager​(LearningManagementSystem lms)
      Constructor for the UIManager.

      All initialization is done in init(), so the constructor solely sets the lms field.

      Parameters:
      lms - The LearningManagementSystem instance used for accessing the rest of the managers.

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes all the static Menu's and all of their relevant headers, options, inputs, and callbacks.

      Contains most of the relevant structure of the UI of the application.

      Uses InputMenu, OptionMenu, and other menus to create the UI.

      See run() for the entry point to the UI.

      Specified by:
      init in interface Manager

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Ran whenever the UI has exited.

      Closes the scanner scanner.

      Specified by:
      exit in interface Manager

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the UI Loop by opening the Start Menu.

      Most (if not all) of the menus that are branched from here are initialized in init()

      See Also:
      LearningManagementSystem.run(), Menu.open()

    • getScanner

      public Scanner getScanner()
      Accesses the scanner used for user input.
      Returns:
      Scanner The Scanner used for user input.

    • getCurrentUser

      public User getCurrentUser()
      Accesses the current User that is logged in.
      Returns:
      User The current User logged in. Can be null if no user is logged in.

    • setCurrentUser

      public void setCurrentUser​(User currentUser)
      Sets the current User

      Is used inside menuLogin to set the logged-in user, and is set to null inside menuMainStudent and menuMainTeacher to logout the user.

      Parameters:
      currentUser - The current user. Can be null.
